description:
This string: "Disabled reason contains invalid characters or is too long"

found in 
nova/api/openstack/compute/contrib/services.py:177, nova/api/openstack/compute/plugins/v3/services.py:159

should be fixed.

From the spanish translation team:
Se recomienda que esta cadena sea reestructurada en su versión original, particularmente "Disabled reason".


Essentially, the string isn't the best English and should be re-written so it can be translated properly - particularly the use of "Disabled reason".
title: bad english in string: 'Disabled reason contains invalid characters or is too long'

comments.content:
This string: "Disabled reason contains invalid characters or is too long"

found in 
nova/api/openstack/compute/contrib/services.py:177, nova/api/openstack/compute/plugins/v3/services.py:159

should be fixed.

From the spanish translation team:
Se recomienda que esta cadena sea reestructurada en su versión original, particularmente "Disabled reason".


Essentially, the string isn't the best English and should be re-written so it can be translated properly - particularly the use of "Disabled reason".
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~fifieldt

comments.content:
Looking at the code, two suggestions

1) either "Disabled reason" should be "disabled_reason", or
2) the string should be changed to: "The string containing the reason for disabling the service contains invalid characters or is too long."
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~fifieldt
